mapper.insert: INSERT INTO examinfo(exam_id, question_id, type) VALUES (#{exam_id}, #{question_id}, #{type})
mapper.update: UPDATE examinfo SET status = -1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS examInfoId, b.* FROM examinfo a
LEFT JOIN choicequestion b ON a.question_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN objectivequestion b ON a.question_id = b.id
WHERE a.exam_id = #{examId} AND a.type = #{type} AND a.status = 0
